A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The more I think about this film\, the less I like it. The script is full of holes and highly illogical decisions. The dialogue is not great\, the action is dull and tired\, the ending is unsatisfactory and the new characters are obnoxious and politically charged. 

Mark Hamill does a great job as Luke\, but his character is highly contradictory to the Luke Skywalker of the past. The things he does in this film are things the George Lucas Luke would never do. 

This film was crap as an adventure film and really just a slow war movie in space. I expected more. Kylo Ren was pretty good and I like the character more. I like Rey a little bit more\, as well.
